channel.title: Brain – GAME ONLINE
channel.description: GAME ACRADE - HTML5 FREE PLAY ONLINE

item.title: Cute Folding Paper
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Cute Folding Paper is a casual logic kids game. Your origami skills will grow with every fold in this brain-stimulating puzzle adventure. Master each folded creation to crack the code and unfold the next mind-bending puzzle. Are you ready to test your logic?On pcClick to fold.On mobile and tabletClick to fold.
item.content:encoded:
Cute Folding Paper is a casual logic kids game. Your origami skills will grow with every fold in this brain-stimulating puzzle adventure. Master each folded creation to crack the code and unfold the next mind-bending puzzle. Are you ready to test your logic?
On pcClick to fold.On mobile and tabletClick to fold.

item.title: Mahjong Sort Puzzle
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Mahjong Sort Puzzle is a brain online game. You sort out the mahjong, sort out the mahjong with the same color into a grid and they will all be eliminated.On PCClick or tap to play.On MobileTap to play.
item.content:encoded:
Mahjong Sort Puzzle is a brain online game. You sort out the mahjong, sort out the mahjong with the same color into a grid and they will all be eliminated.
On PCClick or tap to play.On MobileTap to play.

item.title: Puzzle Box – Brain Fun
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Puzzle Box – Brain Fun is a brain game containing multiple modes. You will face various intellectual challenges to exercise your brain and improve your IQ! Here are various popular puzzle games, such as find out, hair transplant, jigsaw, and matching games. Different levels of difficulty and gameplay are waiting for you to unlock!On PCClick […]
item.content:encoded:
Puzzle Box – Brain Fun is a brain game containing multiple modes. You will face various intellectual challenges to exercise your brain and improve your IQ! Here are various popular puzzle games, such as find out, hair transplant, jigsaw, and matching games. Different levels of difficulty and gameplay are waiting for you to unlock!
On PCClick or drag the target objects to play.On MobileClick or drag the target objects to play.

item.title: Pin Puzzle: Save The Sheep
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Pin Puzzle: Save The Sheep is a rescue online game. The shape is in danger. You should make the sheep eat food and save them from their predicament. But be aware that you may meet a lot of obstacles that you need to avoid.On PCClick or tap to pull the pin.On MobileClick or tap to […]
item.content:encoded:
Pin Puzzle: Save The Sheep is a rescue online game. The shape is in danger. You should make the sheep eat food and save them from their predicament. But be aware that you may meet a lot of obstacles that you need to avoid.
On PCClick or tap to pull the pin.On MobileClick or tap to pull the pin.

item.title: Kindergarten School Teacher
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Kindergarten School Teacher online game is an original children’s studying game. Kindergarten teachers assist you in your daily toddler educational tasks. Loads of fun free learning games from learning mathematics to painting your drawing. With various educational things from matching to solving an appealing puzzle.On PC and mobileClick to play.
item.content:encoded:
Kindergarten School Teacher online game is an original children’s studying game. Kindergarten teachers assist you in your daily toddler educational tasks. Loads of fun free learning games from learning mathematics to painting your drawing. With various educational things from matching to solving an appealing puzzle.
On PC and mobileClick to play.

item.title: Rope Puzzle
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Rope Puzzle is a brain online game. You should utilize the rope to free everyone, control the rope, and overcome the obstacles. Drag the rope to make a safe path, control the rope, and rescue everyone. Sawtooths are dangerous and you’re in a rescue game, be careful with these obstacles.On PCClick and drag the rope […]
item.content:encoded:
Rope Puzzle is a brain online game. You should utilize the rope to free everyone, control the rope, and overcome the obstacles. Drag the rope to make a safe path, control the rope, and rescue everyone. Sawtooths are dangerous and you’re in a rescue game, be careful with these obstacles.
On PCClick and drag the rope to play.On MobileClick and drag the rope to play.

item.title: Construction Set 3D
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Construction Set 3D is a casual online game. Find the right piece and simply tap to add it to your build. The colorful pieces and lively scenes make this building game a hoot for builders of all ages! In Constructor 3D, you never have to worry about losing a piece or prying bricks apart and […]
item.content:encoded:
Construction Set 3D is a casual online game. Find the right piece and simply tap to add it to your build. The colorful pieces and lively scenes make this building game a hoot for builders of all ages! In Constructor 3D, you never have to worry about losing a piece or prying bricks apart and hurting your fingers, because it’s all virtual!
On PCClick on the screen to play.On MobileClick on the screen to play.

item.title: Brain Puzzle: Tricky Choices
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Brain Puzzle: Tricky Choices is a brain puzzle game. Use your imaginative brain to solve all the tricky brain puzzles, find the right storyline, and then pass the level.On PCClick or drag the target objects to play.On MobileClick or drag the target objects to play.
item.content:encoded:
Brain Puzzle: Tricky Choices is a brain puzzle game. Use your imaginative brain to solve all the tricky brain puzzles, find the right storyline, and then pass the level.
On PCClick or drag the target objects to play.On MobileClick or drag the target objects to play.

item.title: Hexa Sort 3D
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Hexa Sort 3D is a puzzle challenge game that merges strategic matching and a satisfying merging experience. Accumulate a certain number of hexagons of the same color and they’re going to be eliminated. Stacks of hexagons are of different colors. You need to consider where to place them to eliminate them faster.On PCDrag the hexagon […]
item.content:encoded:
Hexa Sort 3D is a puzzle challenge game that merges strategic matching and a satisfying merging experience. Accumulate a certain number of hexagons of the same color and they’re going to be eliminated. Stacks of hexagons are of different colors. You need to consider where to place them to eliminate them faster.
On PCDrag the hexagon to play.On MobileDrag the hexagon to play.

item.title: Kuukiyomi: Consider It
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Kuukiyomi: Consider It is a fun and nonsensical puzzle adventure game. You should take action to make the storyline reasonable. This game has hand-drawn-style graphics. We designed this game with the hope that it would be a funny and witty way to make people have a different fun experience in awkward moments.PCMouse click and drag […]
item.content:encoded:
Kuukiyomi: Consider It is a fun and nonsensical puzzle adventure game. You should take action to make the storyline reasonable. This game has hand-drawn-style graphics. We designed this game with the hope that it would be a funny and witty way to make people have a different fun experience in awkward moments.
PCMouse click and drag to playMobileTap and slide to play
